Tokenize

```{r}
metamorph_tidy <- Metamorphosis |>
  mutate(line = row_number()) |>
  unnest_tokens(word, text, token = "words")   

tokenized   # one row per word, instead of one per line

metamorph_tidy |> slice_tail(n = 20)
```
